name: gtfs-sequelize
description: A model for the static GTFS using sequelize.

scripts.test: npm run test-download && npm run test-mysql-load && npm run test-mysql-spatial-load && npm run test-pg-load && npm run test-postgis-load
scripts.test-mysql: npm run test-download && npm run test-mysql-load
scripts.test-mysql-spatial: npm run test-download && npm run test-mysql-spatial-load
scripts.test-pg: npm run test-download && npm run test-pg-load
scripts.test-postgis: npm run test-download && npm run test-postgis-load

author: Evan Siroky
